publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1231 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2004-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-1231 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2004-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
